name: Diceologist
description:
READ BEFORE PLAYING

Controls

  • WASD - to move.
  • Q & E - to cycle your dice.
  • Space to use your dice.
  • Left Mouse Button to aim and attack.

Dice Mechanics

  • While in your inventory, your dice will give a passive bonus dictated by a pop-up underneath them.
  • When used, your dice will give a slight permanent boost to its particular stat!
  • Your cursed die has an infinite number of uses, but, it has the possibility of rolling a 0. Play carefully!

Gameplay

  • Use the power of dice to adventure into the Heckhole! A mysterious hole you've found in the middle of nowhere that seems to have no bottom!
  •  You play as Eris, an unfortunate human soul that has been cursed by an ancient forbidden die. You believe that at the bottom of the Heckhole you will find a way to rid yourself of it.  
  • The contents of the hole are affected by your die! You may come across upgrades, downgrades, and even the rooms themselves will change depending on what you roll to enter them. Be careful!

Post Mortem

I had a lot of fun developing this, this theme honestly had quite a lot of potential and I had several ideas. I had to cut a significant amount of content from this game due to time constraints.
